Token.Abstract: Criteria for an application which is available to be launched on a device. The application does not need to be currently running.

Parameter.Name: applicationID
Parameter.Abstract: The application ID. Must be non-nil.

Token.Abstract: Criteria for an application which is currently running on the device and supports all of the given namespaces, optionally also with a particular application ID. (Deprecated: {This method is deprecated. Filtering by running application ID is not supported by the SDK. Calling this method will ignore the applicationID parameter and simply delegate to @link #criteriaForRunningApplicationWithSupportedNamespaces: @endlink.})

Parameter.Name: applicationID
Parameter.Abstract: The application ID. Optional; may be nil, in which case only the namespace will be used.

Parameter.Name: supportedNamespaces
Parameter.Abstract: An array of namespace strings. Must be non-nil.

Token.Abstract: Criteria for an application which is currently running on the device and supports all of the given namespaces.

Parameter.Name: supportedNamespaces
Parameter.Abstract: An array of namespace strings. Must be non-nil.
